00036 #include <iostream>
00037 
00038 #include "Timer.hpp"
00039 #include "LogFile.hpp"
00040 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00041 
00042 double Timer::msStartTime = 0.0; // In case user forgets to Reset() before printing.
00043 
00044 void Timer::Reset()
00045 {
00046     msStartTime = GetWallTime(); // Arbitrary start time in seconds
00047 }
00048 
00049 double Timer::GetWallTime()
00050 {
00051     return MPI_Wtime();
00052 }
00053 
00054 double Timer::GetElapsedTime()
00055 {
00056     return GetWallTime() - msStartTime;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void Timer::Print(std::string message)
00060 {
00061     double time = GetElapsedTime();
00062     if (PetscTools::IsParallel())
00063     {
00064         std::cout << "proc " << PetscTools::GetMyRank() << ": ";
00065     }
00066     std::cout << message << " time: " << time << "s\n" << std::flush;
00067     LOG(2,"    " << message << " time: "<< time <<"s");
00068 }
00069 
00070 void Timer::PrintAndReset(std::string message)
00071 {
00072     Print(message);
00073     Reset();
00074 }
